title: (x) Condensed Gothic Typeface.. Which? - Heroic Condensed {Riccardo, Penn}
content:
Hi, anyone know what font this is (in orange)? I can't figure it out and it's driving me crazy... It's condensed and gothic.

Thanks for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020095026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/03b_6611.jpg)
author: nuvru

comments.content: It's probably Univer 49, manually condensed even more...

Being it a "volley" from the Vinh vs. Felton Layer Tennis match ( [http://layertennis.com/100219/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020095026/http:/layertennis.com/100219/ "http://layertennis.com/100219/")), I think it could be one of the typefaces usually used by Felton for his annual reports:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/47969](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020095026/http:/typophile.com/node/47969 "http://typophile.com/node/47969")  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/66238](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020095026/http:/www.typophile.com/node/66238 "http://www.typophile.com/node/66238")
It's missing the typical Univers G.
omg yes.. awesome.. btw, where's the buy me a beer link in your sigs?
